TEXT.TITLE: INTERSTATE BAKERIES <IBC> SIGNS PACT
TEXT.BODY: Interstate Bakeries Corp said it has entered into a joint venture with Pain Jacquet S.A., Europe's leading bread baker, for distribution of a three item French bread line. Interstate said terms of transaction were not disclosed. Reuter
